metadata_element_list.name: ID
metadata_element_list.description: The basic identifier for items throughout Media Manager

metadata_element_list.name: Original Asset ID
metadata_element_list.description: Asset identifier of original version of asset (Equals uoi_id when version = 1)

metadata_element_list.name: Model
metadata_element_list.description: Metadata model for this asset (FK to models.id)

metadata_element_list.name: Properties Last Edited By
metadata_element_list.description: User who changed metadata state (FK to users.user_id)

metadata_element_list.name: Content Editor
metadata_element_list.description: User who changed content state (FK to users.user_id)

metadata_element_list.name: Imported By
metadata_element_list.description: User who imported/updated asset (FK to users.user_id)

metadata_element_list.name: Properties First Edited By
metadata_element_list.description: User who validated metadata (FK to users.user_id)

metadata_element_list.name: Master File Path
metadata_element_list.description: File location of master object in repository

metadata_element_list.name: Path: Thumbnail
metadata_element_list.description: File location of low resolution object in repository

metadata_element_list.name: Path: Screen Res
metadata_element_list.description: File location of medium resolution object in repository

metadata_element_list.name: Asset Gist
metadata_element_list.description: Gist of text content of master object- generated by linguistics server

metadata_element_list.name: Content Subtype
metadata_element_list.description: Content subtype for asset (e.g WHOLE or CLIP)

metadata_element_list.name: Version Description
metadata_element_list.description: Description of this particular version (aka check-in reason)

metadata_element_list.id: ARTESIA.FIELD.CONTENT LAST LOCKED OR UN-LOCKED BY
metadata_element_list.name: Content Last Locked Or Un-locked By
metadata_element_list.description: User who last locked or un-locked content (FK to users.user_id)
metadata_element_list.prompt: Content Last Locked Or Un-locked By

metadata_element_list.id: ARTESIA.FIELD.DATE CONTENT LAST LOCKED OR UN-LOCKED
metadata_element_list.name: Date: Content last locked or un-locked
metadata_element_list.description: Date content was last locked or un-locked
metadata_element_list.prompt: Date: Content last locked or un-locked

metadata_element_list.id: ARTESIA.FIELD.PROPERTIES LAST LOCKED OR UN-LOCKED BY
metadata_element_list.name: Properties last locked or un-locked by
metadata_element_list.description: User who last locked or un-locked metadata (FK to users.user_id)
metadata_element_list.prompt: Properties last locked or un-locked by

metadata_element_list.id: ARTESIA.FIELD.DATE PROPERTIES LAST LOCKED OR UN-LOCKED
metadata_element_list.name: Date: Properties Last Locked Or Un-Locked
metadata_element_list.description: Date metadata was last locked or un-locked
metadata_element_list.prompt: Date: Properties Last Locked Or Un-Locked

metadata_element_list.id: ARTESIA.FIELD.ASSET LAST DELETED OR UN-DELETED BY
metadata_element_list.name: Asset last deleted or un-deleted by
metadata_element_list.description: User who last deleted or un-deleted the asset (FK to users.user_id)
metadata_element_list.prompt: Asset last deleted or un-deleted by

metadata_element_list.id: ARTESIA.FIELD.DATE ASSET LAST DELETED OR UN-DELETED
metadata_element_list.name: Date: Asset last deleted or un-deleted
metadata_element_list.description: Date asset was last deleted or un-deleted
metadata_element_list.prompt: Date: Asset last deleted or un-deleted
